overview: “Linda In Wonderland” is Linda Lavin’s variety television special that aired on Thanksgiving Day, 1980.  Special guests include;  Lynn Redgrave, Anthony Newley and Ron Leibman.  Her characters of “Alice Hyatt” and “Sam Butler” from her television show “Alice” also make appearances as Ms. Lavin plays dual roles for both.  Ms. Lavin and her guests perform Broadway and other musical numbers in various settings and medleys, mixed in with solo performances and Linda giving us a little background about herself growing up, along with some humor and pizzazz.
title: Linda in Wonderland
